attributes.action: Close are doors to all refugees until we have counted numbers and cost of our current situation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment the government are not certain how may legal & illegal refugees we have residing in this country. I propose that we do not let anymore in until we have a definitive number and work out how any further refugees are funded in a fair way to the current citizens.

rejection.details: There are several petitions already up and running on this theme which you may prefer to sign up to
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
